actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Investor Protection Act to increase the amount of protection available under such Act to customers of brokers and dealers.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Investor Protection Act to increase the amount of claims that the Securities Investor Protection Corporation will pay to customers of brokers and dealers who are involved in liquidation proceedings.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Investor Protection Act to increase the amount of protection available under such Act to customers of brokers and dealers.
